verses.verse: But <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
<S%H3863>Oh<s%> that my <S%H3708>grief<s%> were thoroughly <S%H8254>weighed,<s%> and my <S%H1942>calamity<s%> <S%H5375>laid<s%> in the <S%H3976>balances<s%> <S%H3162>together!<s%>
For <S%H6258>now<s%> it would be <S%H3513>heavier<s%> than the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> are <S%H3886>swallowed<s%> up.

For the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> are <S%H5978>within<s%> me, the <S%H2534>poison<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> <S%H8354>drinks<s%> up my <S%H7307>spirit:<s%> the <S%H1161>terrors<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> do set themselves in <S%H6186>array<s%> against me.
Does the <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>ass<s%> <S%H5101>bray<s%> when he has <S%H1877>grass?<s%> or <S%H1600>lows<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H1098>fodder?<s%>
Can that which is <S%H8602>unsavory<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H4417>salt?<s%> or is there any <S%H2940>taste<s%> in the <S%H7388>white<s%> of an <S%H2495>egg?<s%>
The things that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5060>touch<s%> are as my <S%H1741>sorrowful<s%> <S%H3899>meat.<s%>
Oh that I might <S%H935>have<s%> my <S%H7596>request;<s%> and that <S%H433>God<s%> would <S%H5414>grant<s%> me the thing that I <S%H8615>long<s%> for!
Even that it would <S%H2974>please<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> to <S%H1792>destroy<s%> me; that he would let <S%H5425>loose<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H1214>cut<s%> me off!

Then should I <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H5165>comfort;<s%> yes, I would <S%H5539>harden<s%> myself in <S%H2427>sorrow:<s%> let him not <S%H2550>spare;<s%> for I have not <S%H3582>concealed<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One.
<S%H4100>What<s%> is my <S%H3581>strength,<s%> that I should <S%H3176>hope?<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> is my <S%H7093>end,<s%> that I should <S%H748>prolong<s%> my <S%H5315>life?<s%>
Is my <S%H3581>strength<s%> the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of <S%H68>stones?<s%> or is my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H5153>brass?<s%>
Is not my <S%H5833>help<s%> in me? and is <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H5080>quite<s%> from me?
To him that is <S%H4523>afflicted<s%> <S%H2617>pity<s%> should be showed from his <S%H7453>friend;<s%> but he <S%H5800>forsakes<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
My <S%H251>brothers<s%> have dealt <S%H898>deceitfully<s%> as a <S%H5158>brook,<s%> and as the <S%H650>stream<s%> of <S%H5158>brooks<s%> they <S%H5674>pass<s%> away;
Which are <S%H6937>blackish<s%> by <S%H4480>reason<s%> of the <S%H7140>ice,<s%> and wherein the <S%H7950>snow<s%> is <S%H5956>hid:<s%>
What <S%H6256>time<s%> they wax <S%H2215>warm,<s%> they <S%H6789>vanish:<s%> when it is <S%H2527>hot,<s%> they are <S%H1846>consumed<s%> out of their <S%H4725>place.<s%>
The <S%H734>paths<s%> of their <S%H1870>way<s%> are <S%H3943>turned<s%> <S%H3943>aside;<s%> they <S%H5927>go<s%> to <S%H8414>nothing,<s%> and <S%H6>perish.<s%>
The <S%H734>troops<s%> of <S%H8485>Tema<s%> <S%H5027>looked,<s%> the <S%H1979>companies<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> <S%H6960>waited<s%> for them.
They were <S%H954>confounded<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they had <S%H982>hoped;<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>thither,<s%> and were <S%H2659>ashamed.<s%>
For <S%H6258>now<s%> you are <S%H3808>nothing;<s%> you <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H2866>casting<s%> down, and are <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>
Did I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3051>Bring<s%> to me? or, Give a <S%H7809>reward<s%> for me of your <S%H3581>substance?<s%>
Or, <S%H4422>Deliver<s%> me from the <S%H6862>enemy's<s%> <S%H3027>hand?<s%> or, <S%H6299>Redeem<s%> me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6184>mighty?<s%>
<S%H3384>Teach<s%> me, and I will <S%H2790>hold<s%> my <S%H2790>tongue:<s%> and cause me to <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H4100>wherein<s%> I have <S%H7683>erred.<s%>
<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H4834>forcible<s%> are <S%H3476>right<s%> <S%H561>words!<s%> but <S%H4100>what<s%> does your <S%H3198>arguing<s%> <S%H3198>reprove?<s%>
Do you <S%H2803>imagine<s%> to <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H4405>words,<s%> and the <S%H561>speeches<s%> of one that is <S%H2976>desperate,<s%> which are as <S%H7307>wind?<s%>
<S%H637>Yes,<s%> you <S%H5307>overwhelm<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and you <S%H3738>dig<s%> a pit for your <S%H7453>friend.<s%>
<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore be <S%H2974>content,<s%> <S%H6437>look<s%> on me; for it is <S%H5921>evident<s%> <S%H6440><s%> to you <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H3576>lie.<s%>
<S%H7725>Return,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, let it not be <S%H5766>iniquity;<s%> yes, <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> my <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> is in it.
Is there <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> in my <S%H3956>tongue?<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> my <S%H2441>taste<s%> <S%H995>discern<s%> <S%H1942>perverse<s%> things?
